items.title: Tests of 12+ AI-detection tools show many capable of spotting basic fakes, but struggle with complex images; few analyze video, and most identified fake audio (Stuart A. Thompson/New York Times)
items.title_en: Tests of 12+ AI-detection tools show many capable of spotting basic fakes, but struggle with complex images; few analyze video, and most identified fake audio (Stuart A. Thompson/New York Times)
items.title_zh: 对超过 12 种人工智能检测工具的测试表明，许多工具能够识别基本的赝品，但难以处理复杂的图像；很少有人分析视频，大多数都识别出虚假音频（Stuart A. Thompson/纽约时报）
